definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Apries, reigned in Egypt alone, B.C. 589 – 570 and with Amasis 570–564; named as [[מֶלֶח־מִחְרַיִם]] ´[[פַּרְעׂה ח]] Je 44:30 Pharaoh Hophraï king of Egypt (v. [[פַּרְעׂה]]); 4th king of 26th dynasty; LXX Ou)afrh; Manetho Ou)/afriv; Egypt. Monum. Uaḥ-ȧbra, Wiedemann:Ägypt. Gesch. 602, 636 ff.; Gesch. Ägypt. 163 ff.; GK. )Apri/hv Herodot.:ii. 161 etc. (v. Wied:Herodot's 2tes Buch, 569), Diodor:i. 68; )Apri/av Ctesias (Athen. 13:560).
